name: Investment Property Forum
goal:
The IPF is the leading UK property investment organisation for individual members, comprising a network of over 2,000 senior professionals drawn from across the property investment and finance market.
The IPF is not a lobby organisation. Rather, its mission is to enhance the understanding and efficiency of property investment in all its forms (i.e. public, private, equity, debt and synthetic exposure), by both its members and other interested parties, including Government. We do this through undertaking research, running seminars/workshops and providing a forum for discussion and debate around the current topics affecting the market.
interests: Climate Action, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , General and Institutional Affairs, Taxation
euInitiatives: AIFMD, EMIR, Solvency II, ELTIFs, CMU
